vulnerabilities.Details: Injected payload was executed in a 'HTML' context. Description: Basic script tag injection
vulnerabilities.remediation: Sanitize user input and implement proper output encoding based on context.

vulnerabilities.Details: Injected payload was executed in a 'Attribute' context. Description: Breaks out of an attribute and uses an SVG tag with onload event. (DURSGO_MARKER)
vulnerabilities.remediation: Sanitize user input and implement proper output encoding based on context.
